title: Callout With Image Widget
description: A callout component that displays text with an optional image and different color variants

image.description: URL of the image to display

text.description: Text content to display in the callout

variant.description: Visual variant of the callout. INFO: Green background with darker green text. WARNING: Yellow background with darker yellow text. DANGER: Red background with darker red text. BRAND: Brand primary color background with darker brand primary color text.
